sen.e: Even if there is the opinion that the Japan's first capital is Dazaifu (local government office in Kyushu region), there was virtually no academic thesis which taken up affirmatively in the scietific journal with peer review, and, generally it is not considered that the Kyushu dynasty theory and the related opinion are scientific theories.
